mapper.insert: INSERT INTO contract(business_num, cust_num, item_num, item_name, business_name, business_date, out_date, incharge_name, contract_qty) VALUES(#{business_num}, #{cust_num}, #{item_num}, #{item_name}, #{business_name}, #{business_date}, #{out_date}, #{incharge_name}, #{contract_qty})
mapper.select:
SELECT * from contract
where item_name like CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')
where business_name like CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')
order by business_num desc limit #{startRow}, #{pageSize}

select count(*) from contract
where item_name like CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')
where business_name like CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')
SELECT customer.cust_num, customer.cust_name from customer join contract on customer.cust_num = contract.cust_num
